info.author: Austin Hartzheim
classifiers: License :: OSI Approved :: GNU General Public License v3 (GPLv3)
info.description: Quickly create chat bots that vary their dialogue by using an easy to learn, but powerful XML-based markup language to craft their replies. Messagin automatically generates varied output based on the input markup so conversations stay fresh and avoid repetition.
info.keywords: natural language, language, chat, bot, irc
info.name: messagin
info.summary: Simulate natural language conversation with message variation.
info.html_description: Quickly create chat bots that vary their dialogue by using an easy to learn, but powerful XML-based markup language to craft their replies. Messagin automatically generates varied output based on the input markup so conversations stay fresh and avoid repetition.
